alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Graham; Norton; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 10 at 2:49PM CDT until October 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 003, 004, 014, 015, AND 016... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Red Flag Warning which is in effect from 9 AM to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur, Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan and Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised. * Additional Details... A cold front is expected to move through during the late afternoon/early evening. Winds will suddenly increase and shift to out of the north as the front passes.
info.instruction: Avoid burning or creating sparks. If a fire starts, putting it out will be more difficult due to strong wind speeds and changing directions.
